name: Violet Fungus
senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

actions.name: Rotting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.
